page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS IN POYNTINGTON
page.content: In the last three years local women and some men have given their time and skill working{Tapestry}Kneelers as a practical yet attractive enrichment for their churches.They are worked in various designs but with a predominant blue backround at Poyntington.{Patchwork}and Home Dress_ making classes arranged by the Women's Institute have taught these skills to quite a lot of ladies and some lovely quilts and cushions have been created. Two artists enjoy{painting}in a semi_ professional way and an Exhibition of Local Arts & Crafts is staged at the Poyntington Festivals and sometimes at W.I. meetings. Knitting for Oxfam or family needs is a winter occupation for some ladies while men use their own grapes or hedgerow fruits and flowers to make wine,often with excellent results.
